Sentencas: Because of the different densification characteristics of a La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-delta (LCCC) interconnector and a NiO added yttrium-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode, complete adhesion between the two layers is hardly obtainable.
Titulo: Adhesion behavior between yttrium-stabilized zirconia added La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-δ interconnector and yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based substrate

Sentencas: In this study, we have investigated the sintering behavior of LCCC with the addition of YSZ.
Titulo: Adhesion behavior between yttrium-stabilized zirconia added La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-δ interconnector and yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based substrate

Sentencas: As the amount of YSZ increases, densification of the LCCC is inhibited and the initial temperature of the densification increases.
Titulo: Adhesion behavior between yttrium-stabilized zirconia added La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-δ interconnector and yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based substrate

Sentencas: However, when the LCCC-YSZ composite layer is screen printed on the NiO-YSZ substrates, the density of the composite layer increases and the layer is firmly attached to the substrates.
Titulo: Adhesion behavior between yttrium-stabilized zirconia added La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-δ interconnector and yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based substrate

Sentencas: It is proposed that tensile stress is decreased on the composite layer due to the relatively delayed densification of the LCCC-YSZ composite, compared to the densification of the NiO-YSZ substrate.
Titulo: Adhesion behavior between yttrium-stabilized zirconia added La0.8Ca0.2Cr0.9Co0.1O3-δ interconnector and yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based substrate
